title: marking-definition
description: The marking-definition object represents a specific marking.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `marking-definition`.

created_by_ref.description: The created_by_ref property specifies the ID of the identity object that describes the entity that created this Marking Definition.

created.description: The created property represents the time at which the first version of this Marking Definition object was created.

external_references.description: A list of external references which refers to non-STIX information.

object_marking_refs.description: The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of IDs of marking-definition objects that apply to this Marking Definition.

granular_markings.description: The granular_markings property specifies a list of granular markings applied to this object.

definition_type.description: The definition_type property identifies the type of Marking Definition.

definition.description: The definition property contains the marking object itself.

statement.description: The Statement marking type defines the representation of a textual marking statement (e.g., copyright, terms of use, etc.) in a definition
A statement (e.g., copyright, terms of use) applied to the content marked by this marking definition.

tlp.description: The TLP marking type defines how you would represent a Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) marking in a definition field.
The TLP level of the content marked by this marking definition, as defined in this section.

identifier.json.title: identifier
identifier.json.description: Represents identifiers across the CTI specifications. The format consists of the name of the top-level object being identified, followed by two dashes (--), followed by a UUIDv4.

timestamp.json.title: timestamp
timestamp.json.description: Represents timestamps across the CTI specifications. The format is an RFC3339 timestamp, with a required timezone specification of 'Z'.

external-reference.json.title: external-reference
external-reference.json.description: External references are used to describe pointers to information represented outside of STIX.

url.description: A URL reference to an external resource.

source_name.description: The source within which the external-reference is defined (system, registry, organization, etc.)

external_id.description: An identifier for the external reference content.

url-regex.json.title: url
url-regex.json.description: Matches the elements of a URL using a regular expression. Uses Diego Perini's regex from https://gist.github.com/dperini/729294.

granular-marking.json.title: granular-marking
granular-marking.json.description: The granular-marking type defines how the list of marking-definition objects referenced by the marking_refs property to apply to a set of content identified by the list of selectors in the selectors property.

selectors.description: A list of selectors for content contained within the STIX object in which this property appears.

marking_ref.description: The marking_ref property specifies the ID of the marking-definition object that describes the marking.
